A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: People like to find something to complain about\, and in 2017 it was this film. This movie was a fantastic change of pace coming off of Force Awakens. The cinematography\, in particular\, was mind-blowing. If people take issue with the comedic additions in this film\, one of the most painful lines in the Star Wars saga was uttered in their beloved Force Awakens - Fin desperately asking Rey if she has a boyfriend. The Last Jedi is refreshingly new where Force Awakens was traditionally stale.
